title: Incredible trance in a group with Dr. Marco Paret / QUANTUM ALCHEMY AND HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates an amazing group non-verbal hypnosis and quantum alchemy techniques, at one of his masterclasses in Italy. He is teaching the power of the gaze - Fascination and Mesmerism, from the ancient traditions. His students get to experience the most unique techniques and trance states, that liberate, transform and connect to the deepest self. In this video, they entered in a powerful state of hypnotic induction. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
